Home Components API

Web Components Library

Modern, lightweight, and framework-agnostic components

Quick Start

// Install the package
npm install @your-org/web-components

// Import the component
import '@your-org/web-components/my-component';

// Use in HTML
<my-component>
  Your content here
</my-component>

Basic Examples

Default Usage

This is a basic example 
<my-component>
  This is a basic example
</my-component>

With Custom Styling

Customized component 
<my-component style="--primary-color: #e44d26;">
  Customized component
</my-component>
